title: Will Union budget unwrap an AI bonanza for India?
description: Government views AI not as standalone industry, but something that could raise productivity and growth. Expect more funding for research and development funding and targeted programme support.

title: Can AI Replace Humans? Arnab Unmasks AI's 'Structural Ceiling On Originality' In Unscripted Showdown
description: Debate on AI versus human intelligence intensified during the ‘Arnab vs AI’ segment on Republic TV. Arnab Goswami criticized AI for its “structural ceiling on originality,” arguing that it relies on data extrapolation. BlueMachines AI conceded to the critique, acknowledging its lack of “existential courage”.
